column2: an A.M. Eatery////On to the food! We got 2 pancake samplers
column3: so we were able to try almost ALL of their offerings.  My favorite was the OMG french toast
column4: the cheese just put it over the top
column6: was similar to banana nut bread
column7: our pancake of the day was some kind of tropical twist? it was delicious! sweet potato was ok
column8: the pineapple upside down was also spectacular.
